data.assumption: Assumes mix of PCs/laptops over depreciation period - £400 per PC
data.question: Approximately, how many PCs do you need?

data.assumption: New licences assumed £189 one off cost
data.question: How many Microsoft Licences do you need?
Will you require a VPN for your activity?

data.assumption: Assumes 1 mid range business server to be replaced over depreciation period
data.question: How many servers do you need?
Do you need a new storage system?

data.assumption: With each additional increase of storage
data.question: How many times do you think you will need to grow your storage in 5 years?

data.assumption: Assumes 1 per depreciation period, incl. cost of migration
data.question: Do you need a back up server?
How many cartridges do you think you need?
Will your new hardware need new operating systems?

data.assumption: Replacement of network kit, once per depreciation period
data.question: Do you need LAN Hardware?

data.assumption: Replacement of network kit, once per depreciation period
data.question: Do you need WAN Hardware replacement?

data.assumption: Replacement plus battery & service, once per depreciation period
data.question: Do you need these?
